Posted By: Anthony S.
For Sale:

1) N172 Fogarty, Philadelphia --- SOLD

Just Threw a Grenade pose.  Poor condition due to an apparent fire that broke out in the card's upper left corner.  Fortunately tiny firemen arrived in time to spare the rest of the card.  


2) N172 Geiss, Chicago --- SOLD

Image presents much cleaner and crisper in person.  My scanner and I are going to have to have a little talk.  



email:  boboinnes33@gmail.com

thanks,
